import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'

export const RightArrow = () => <svg
  viewBox="0 0 14 14"
  width="8px"
  height="14px"
  style={{
    marginLeft: '4px',
    display: 'inline-block',
    shapeRendering: 'inherit',
    verticalAlign: 'middle',
    fill: 'currentColor',
    'path fill': 'currentColor'
  }}
>
  <path d="m11.1 7.35-5.5 5.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.7-.7L10.04 7 4.9 1.85a.5.5 0 1 1 .7-.7l5.5 5.5c.2.2.2.5 0 .7Z"/>
</svg>

<Meta title="Providers/Icons Config"/>

<div className="sb-container">

  <div className="sb-section ">
    # Icons Config Provider

      <p>
          This provider using for provide config for icons font to entire project. It contains from 2 parts:
          * **Provider**
          * **Injector**
      </p>
      <p>
          Provider part must be placed in top component of project (like ```App.vue```)
      </p>

      ```
      // Provide config
      const provider = useIcons();
      provider.setupIconConfig({
          font: 'las',
          prefix: 'la-',
          iconMap: {
              close: 'times',
          },
      });

      ```

      ```
      // Inject config
      const provider = useIcons();
      provider.iconConfig; // this is particular config value
      ```

      <p>
          But you don't need to inject this config manually. Just use component [**{`<Icon name="close" />`}**](/docs/view-icon--docs) instead.
      </p>

  </div>
</div>
